channel.title: Blogs on Xinyu Wu
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Xinyu Wu

item.title: Fast
item.description: Being fast is the key to build something new. If you have a startup idea, build it within a weekend time. If you have a feature to launch, build it within one day. If you want to learn a new language, learn the most basic 200 words within 2 weeks and start using them. If you want to build a personal website, build it within one hour. If you want to write a blog, finish it within 30 minutes.
